title: This ALL AMD ITX Gaming PC Is AWESOME!
description: Thanks to our video Sponsor Micro Center. Shop their Desktop Deals all month long:   More Micro Center links below  I build my first AM5 all AMD ITX gaming system and it turned out super well.  New Customer Exclusive - Get $25 Off Your Purchase of $100 or more:   Get the latest Tech News, Reviews, and Build Guides at Micro Center News:   Links to build components (Amazon Affiliate) Case: Deepcool CH160 :  GPU: Gigabyte RX7700XT  Motherboard: Gigabyte B650I Ultra:   CPU: AMD R5 7600X  RAM: 32GB Lexar ARES:  SSD: Lexar 1TB NM790:  PSU: Corsair SF600 (Link is to new version, SF750):   Cooler: Deepcool Assassin 4:   Better yet, go buy it at Micro Center (Listed the parts of the build they had):  CPU:  Motherboard:  GPU:  CPU cooler:  PSU:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
